newest.message:
== Contributors for this version ==
* Jimi
== Bug Fixes ==
* Fixes a crash bug when selecting to auto-resize the columns of the combat log monitoring list. * Fixed a crash bug when selecting 'Show all groups' in the Item browser of the skill planner. * Fixes a visual bug when special characters (like '<' and '>') are used in user input text in EVE client. * Fixed a crash bug when merging plans that don't contain notes on an entry. * Fixes an issue where the exported file for EFT was causing parsing errors in EFT. * Fixes a crash bug when trying to uncompress an empty response stream. * Fixes a crash bug in item browser when prerequesites are not found in our data.
== Enhancements ==
* Added a fallback logic to none compression uploading for the BattleClinic Service uploading. * Reduced max upload interval time span from 1 day to 15 minutes for the EMUU. * Added ability to check, on an hourly bases, for available endpoints. * Added 2 extra columns in the Manufactouring tab of the Blueprint browser showing the base quantity and perfect ME level for each material.
== Misc ==
* Updated the links to the API key support page. * Several improvements have been done to the code base to make EVEMon a better, faster and more stable application.
